svg.text: Database Schema - OT Change Validation Tool (SQLite)
All change requests from ServiceNow, Mantis, etc.
Baseline change alerts from Industrial Defender
â€¢ All timestamps stored in UTC (ISO 8601 format)
â€¢ JSON fields stored as TEXT, parsed at application layer
â€¢ FTS5 virtual table for full-text search on descriptions
â€¢ Soft deletes via 'deleted_at' column (not shown)
â€¢ WAL mode enabled for concurrent read/write
